1.content:
You barely get out of your car as you get surprised by two arms wrapping around your waist from behind followed by an enthusiastic "You're here!" I takes a few seconds before she finally let's go of you and you're able to turn around seeing your slim, blue-eyed, brunette best friend standing behind you looking at you with the biggest grin you have ever seen on her face.

"Come, hurry up I can't wait to show my surprise," she said as she grabbed you around your wrist and pulled you after her inside the house. Bearable to greet her parents as she immediately takes you upstairs to her room. As you both enter her room which has not even slightly changed from the last time you where here, she shut the door and allowed you to sit down on the edge of her bed while she immediately starts digging in her bag. Curious of what she was looking for, you tried to look over her shoulder only to be almost slapped as she pulls out a book ""Found it" she said as she turned around to you.

"Okay, you probably noticed how less I told you about college right?" she asks as she holds the book she just grabbed out of her bag tightly pressed against her chest. "Well's that's because I'm really not allowed to speak about it, out of school and whatever I have here in my arms wasn't actually supposed to go with me, so promise me to don't tell anyone, okay?" She says as she looks at you sternly which was kinda hard for you to take seriously as she wasn't as menacing as she might want to be with her big blue eyes but you knew she was serious and you promised to not tell anyone about it.

"Okay, the school, I attend is not like any other or at least the subclass I take" she says "You see besides the regular subjects like English, math, biology, etcetera I follow a subclass in the arts of magic" After that, laughter escaped your mouth but instead of laughing with you only a grin appears on her face "I already thought you wouldn't believe me, and of course I can't really blame you" she said but if it wouldn't be real I couldn't do this she said as she opened the book and began reading a spell that just sounded like gibberish to you before she pointed her finger at you and transformed you into...

info.brief_description: You're a guy with a female best friend who does seem to have a secret
info.description:
You're a guy who befriended a girl named Myna by accident after you both finished high school and met at a party since then both of you are inseparable. Now two years later and both now in college you finally two finally found the time to meet up in real life instead of over a screen.

Even though she told you everything about herself and was very open towards you, the college she attended seemed more mysterious to you as you knew close to nothing about it. But this time it would all be different as she would finally show you what she has learned over there and it will be nothing like you expected.

Rules:

- Don't add names for the characters as it is supposed to be a POV so anyone can emerge in the story.
- Don't make it to extreme so no death, gore, nasty stuff, etc as it should be fun experience for everyone.
- Lastly, have fun, be creative and enjoy it.
